note.p: Daughter of Edmond and Arthémise Barbier. Born in Brighton, where her parents lived, possibly in political exile. Married Louis Pierre Defais in 1876; married Charles Auguste Kennerley-Hall in Paris in 1885. Died in France.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/602/56/42), 1871 (RG10/1082/43/30)
UK, foreign and overseas registers of British subjects, 1628–1969 Ancestry.com, accessed 21 February 2020
